FrageText.de: Von welchen Einflussfaktoren hängt die Schräglage eines Motorrades bei Kurvenfahrt ab?
FrageText.en: What factors influence the banking angle of a motorcycle while driving through a curve?
FrageText.hr: O kojim čimbenicima ovisi nagib motocikla u zavoju?
FrageText.sl: Kateri dejavniki imajo vse vpliv na možno nagnjenost vašega motornega kolesa pri vožnji v ovinkih?
FrageText.tr: Virajda giderken motosikletim eyim durumu hangi etki faktörlerine bağlıdır?

en.Text: By the weight of the motorcycle
On the width of the tires
